name: Depth (itch) (spacesharkstudios)
description:
Currently in alpha.

Twin Stick Dungeon Crawler

Your goal right now is to make it as deep into the dungeon as possible. The green-yellow cubes are stairs that go down, the red-blue cubes go up. Press E while standing next to them to use them. See how far you can make it!

Left Mouse - Fireball/Attack

Right Mouse - Fire Blast

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Aim

E - Interact

Blue Enemies follow you but currently don't do damage.

Green enemies will shoot at you from a distance.

Red enemies chase you aggressively while blasting AOE damage, even if it means hurting other enemies!
